conclusion: Determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.
Identify the outlets and baffles: Outlet A is Yellow, Outlet B is Blue, Outlet C is Pink, Baffles D and E are Blue and Purple.
Outlet A (Yellow) is located above the baffles (D and E).
The yellow outlet is above the baffles, which means it will flow into the container below the baffles (D).
Outlet B (Blue) is located below the baffles (D and E).
The blue outlet is below the baffles, which means it will flow into the container above the baffles (E).
Outlet C (Pink) is located between the baffles (D and E).
The pink outlet is between the baffles, which means it will flow into the container below the baffles (D).
The liquid will flow into container D after passing through the baffles.
